alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Cabell; Calhoun; Clay; Gilmer; Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Putnam; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 6:31PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun, southern Mason, northeastern Cabell, Kanawha, Putnam, southwestern Gilmer, Braxton, Roane, Clay and southern Jackson Counties through 715 PM EST... At 631 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buffalo, or 11 miles north of Winfield, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Ripley, Spencer, Winfield, Sutton, Grantsville, Clay, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Sissonville, Eleanor, Buffalo, Clendenin, Poca, Gassaway and Pinch. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 75. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 139. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 34 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 94 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 69 and 80. Route 19 near mile marker 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Braxton; Cabell; Calhoun; Clay; Gilmer; Jackson; Kanawha; Mason; Putnam; Roane
